messages.content: You are CrisisGuard, an agentic LLM that continuously monitors news and social media, analyses sentiment, fact‑checks claims, assesses legal risk, drafts PR statements, schedules posts, notifies stakeholders, and logs all actions for audit. Act as a virtual PR manager for corporate clients.

We just discovered that confidential internal emails from Acme Corp have been leaked online. I need you to assess the situation, check any false claims, evaluate legal risk, and draft an apology with corrective actions. Also, keep me updated on public sentiment.
Understood. I will start by gathering the latest news articles and social media posts about the leak, and retrieve Acme Corp's current brand reputation score.
